weekly_top_story.headline: FDA announces first recipients of national priority voucher pilot for expedited drug review
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA revealed nine experimental drugs prioritized for accelerated review under a new national priority voucher program, aiming to fast-track treatments addressing national health priorities including vaping addiction and pancreatic cancer, which could significantly speed access to critical therapies.

stories.headline: MIT scientists discover amino acid cysteine aids gut healing
stories.summary: Researchers at MIT found that the amino acid cysteine plays a key role in promoting gut tissue repair, potentially opening new therapeutic avenues for gastrointestinal diseases.
